descriptionHtml:
I played around a bit with the dawnbreaker, and this is what came out.

The runes on it are \"Tuz Do Fin Shul\" which translates into Blade of the Sun, I felt it was kinda fitting due to the 

swords properties ^^


Install:

Just place the Data folder straight into the Skyrim folder, nothing else is required.

These textures will replace the original Dawnbreaker sword.


Uninstall: Just remove the folder added from the rar and you\'re all set =)


Credits to Bethesda for a great game, the tireless efforts of SkyrimNexus to keep the site going
and of course all the modders that add new tools and database updates so any modding at all can be done!

Sincerely

PV__86


Feel free to check out my other rune-texture mod:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2173
author: Squirrel86
